sqlMap.select: select board.*, ROWNUM as boardGroupNum from board where boardKindNum = #boardKindNum#
select board.*, ROWNUM as boardGroupNum from board where boardTitle LIKE #boardTitle# || '%' and boardKindNum = #boardKindNum#
select b.*, ROWNUM as boardGroupNum from member a, board b where a.memNum = b.memNum and a.id = #id# and boardKindNum = 6
select b.*, ROWNUM as boardGroupNum from member a, board b where a.memNum = b.memNum and a.id = #id# and boardKindNum = 1
select * from board where boardKindNum = #boardKindNum# and boardNum = #boardNum#
sqlMap.insert: insert into board(boardNum, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardCount, boardKindNum, memNum) values (SEQ_BOARD.nextval, #boardTitle#, #boardContent#, sysdate, 0, #boardKindNum#, #memNum#)
insert into files (fileNum, fileName, boardNum) values (SEQ_FILES.nextval, #fileName#, #boardNum#)
sqlMap.update: update board set boardTitle=#boardTitle#, boardContent=#boardContent# where boardNum=#boardNum#
update files set fileName = #fileName# where boardNum=#boardNum#
update board set boardCount = #boardCount# + 1 where boardNum=#boardNum#
